panels.description: Shows when and how often a pod was restarted.  The graph is zero when the pod is ready. With this it is also possible to determine how long it take for the pod to come ready again.
panels.title: Pod Restarts

panels.description: Displays the current running pods in the namespace.
panels.title: Running

panels.description: Takes the avg of all completed processes per second over the given time range.
panels.title: Completed Processes in avg overtime per sec

panels.description: Takes the avg of all completed tasks per second over the given time range.
panels.title: Completed Tasks in avg overtime per sec

panels.description: Shows how many positions are not updated by exporters per partition. Means what is the difference between last committed exporter position and committed log position.
panels.title: Number of records exported but not acknowledged

panels.description: Shows the position, which was appended last by the leader per partition.
panels.title: Last appended position

panels.description: Shows the last committed log position.
panels.title: Last committed position

panels.description: Shows the last processed position by the stream processor per partition.
panels.title: Last processed position

panels.description: Shows how many records are not exported yet.

targets.expr: sum (zeebe_log_appender_last_committed_position{namespace=~"$namespace", partition=~"$partition"}) by (partition) - sum (zeebe_exporter_last_exported_position{namespace=~"$namespace", partition=~"$partition", exporter="elasticsearch"}) by (partition)

panels.title: Number of records not exported

panels.description: Shows how many records the stream processor has not processed yet.
panels.title: Number of records not processed

panels.description: Shows the last exported position which was committed by the given exporter per partition.
panels.title: Last updated exported position

panels.description: Shows the last exported position per partition.
panels.title: Last exported position

panels.description: Total number of committed snapshots on disk
panels.title: Snapshot Count

panels.description: Approximate duration of taking a single snapshot from the processor point-of-view (without replication or committing).
panels.title: Snapshot Operation Duration

panels.description: Size in bytes of snapshots on disk
panels.title: Snapshot Size

panels.description: Distribution of snapshot file sizes - each snapshot may be comprised of many files, and this shows approximately how "big" files there are and how many "small" files.
panels.title: Snapshot Files Sizes (1m)
Number of files in a snapshot

panels.description: Approximate duration of replicating a snapshot, from the receiver point-of-view.
panels.title: Snapshot Replication Duration

panels.description: On-going snapshot replications from the receiver point-of-view.
panels.title: Snapshot Replications

targets.expr: sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job="kubelet", cluster="", namespace=~"$namespace", image!="", pod_name=~"$pod", container_name!="POD"}[1m]))

panels.description: Shows the bytes read per second for the zeebe pods in the select namespace.
panels.title: Read bytes/s [1m]

panels.description: Shows the written bytes per second by the Zeebe pods in the selected namespace.
panels.title: Written bytes/s [1m]

panels.description: Shows how many bytes the Zeebe Pods transmit per second in the selected namespace.
panels.title: Network bytes/s transmitted [1m]

panels.description: Shows how many bytes the Zeebe Pods have received per second in the selected namespace.
panels.title: Network bytes/s received [1m]

panels.description: Shows the time (latency) between writing the command on the dispatcher and processing it.
panels.title: Processing Latency (Command)

panels.description: Shows the time (latency) between writing the event on the dispatcher and processing it.
panels.title: Processing Latency (Event)

panels.description: Shows the execution time of a process instance. This means the time (latency) between creating the instance and completing it.
panels.title: Processing Execution Time

panels.description: Shows the execution time of a process instance. This means the time (latency) between creating the instance and completing it.
panels.title: Processing Execution Time (avg)

panels.description: Shows the time (latency) between creating the job and activating it.
panels.title: Job Activation Time

panels.description: Shows the complete lifetime of an job. This means the time (latency) between creating the job and completing it.
panels.title: Job Life Time

panels.description: Shows the latency (RTT) of a sent from the gateway to the broker.
panels.title: Gateway Request Latency

panels.description: Shows rate of each error type.
panels.title: Failure Error Code

panels.description: Shows failure rate of requests sent from gateway to the broker.

targets.expr:
sum by (requestType) (rate(zeebe_gateway_failed_requests{namespace=~"$namespace", partition=~"$partition"}[30s])) / 
sum by (requestType) (rate(zeebe_gateway_total_requests{namespace=~"$namespace", partition=~"$partition"}[30s]))

panels.title: Failure Rate by Request Type

panels.description: Approximate Install RPC as measured by the follower.
panels.title: Snapshot Replication Duration

panels.description: Ongoing snapshot replications per partition, from the follower point-of-view.
panels.title: Snapshot Replications
Number of records appended on the leader but not committed
Number of records by which the slowest follower is lagging behind

panels.description: Sum of memtable, table reader and cache memory capacity.

targets.expr: (sum(zeebe_rocksdb_memory_estimate_table_readers_mem{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", partition=~"$partition"}) by (pod, partition)) + (sum(zeebe_rocksdb_memory_size_all_mem_tables{namespace=~"$namespace",pod=~"$pod",  partition=~"$partition"}) by (pod, partition)) + (sum(zeebe_rocksdb_memory_block_cache_capacity{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", partition=~"$partition"}) by (pod, partition)) + (sum(rate(zeebe_rocksdb_live_estimate_num_keys{namespace=~"$namespace",pod=~"$pod",  partition=~"$partition"}[1m])) by (pod, partition) * 10)

panels.title: RocksDB Memory usage

panels.description: Estimated total number of keys in the database per column family
panels.title: Estimated Number of Keys

panels.description: Estimated amount of live data in bytes per column family
panels.title: Estimated Live Data

panels.description:
Returns approximate size of active, unflushed immutable, and pinned immutable memtables (bytes) per partition.

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L807
panels.title: Approx. size of all mem tables

panels.description:
Approximate size of active and unflushed immutable memtables (bytes) per partition.

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L803
panels.title: Approx. current all mem table size

panels.description:
Approximate size of active memtable (bytes) per partition.

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L799
panels.title: Approx. current active mem table size

panels.description: The block cache capacity per column family
panels.title: Block cache capacity

panels.description:
The current usage of the block cache per column family

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/618bf638aabce21262228509e9f99c1c13de2b57/include/rocksdb/cache.h#L261
panels.title: Block cache usage

panels.description:
The current pinned usage of the block cache per column family

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/618bf638aabce21262228509e9f99c1c13de2b57/include/rocksdb/cache.h#L261
panels.title: Pinned block cache usage

panels.description:
Total size (bytes) of all SST  files belong to the latest LSM tree.

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L882
panels.title: Total size of live SST files

panels.description:
Total size (bytes) of all SST files.

WARNING: may slow down online queries if there are too many files.

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L878
panels.title: Total size of all SST files

panels.description:
Return 1 if write has been stopped.

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L908
panels.title: Write stopped

panels.description:
The current actual delayed write rate. 0 means no delay.

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L905
panels.title: Actual write delay rate

panels.description: Return sum of number of entries in all the immutable mem tables.
panels.title: Number of entries in immutable mem Tables

panels.description:
Returns the number of currently running flushes.

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L783
panels.title: Running flush

panels.description:
The number of currently running compactions.

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L791
panels.title: Running compactions

panels.description:
Returns estimated memory used for reading SST tables, excluding memory used in block cache (e.g., filter and index blocks).

https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/e66199d848cd484b816d07359f1dc0f0b99e5351/include/rocksdb/db.h#L832
panels.title: Table Reader Memory

panels.description: Time taken to start and bootstrap partition servers.
panels.title: Atomix Partition Server Startup time

panels.description: Time taken to start and bootstrap partition servers.
panels.title: Atomix Partition Server Startup time

panels.description: Time taken to start and bootstrap partition servers.
panels.title: Atomix Partition Server Startup time

panels.description: Time taken to recover and reprocess events
panels.title: Streamprocessor Recovery Time
